Trade/Device Name(s): BioPlex® 2200 Antiphospholipid Syndrome (APLS) IgM Calibrator Set
BioPlex® 2200 Antiphospholipid Syndrome (APLS) IgM Control Set
Specimen Type(s): Plasma (lithium heparin, sodium heparin, sodium citrate)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BioPlex® 2200 Antiphospholipid Syndrome (APLS) IgM multiplex flow immunoassay for the detection of IgM antibodies to Cardiolipin and Beta-2-Glycoprotein I.
Indications for Use Summary: Aids in the diagnosis of primary Antiphospholipid Syndrome (APS) and APS secondary to systemic lupus erythematosus or SLE-like disorders by detecting IgM antibodies to Cardiolipin and Beta-2-Glycoprotein I in human serum and plasma, used with the Bio-Rad BioPlex 2200 System.
